channel.title: Superman Rejects his Citizenship
channel.description: [size=36pt][font=impact][b][url=http://scoop.today.com/_news/2011/04/28/6551587-superman-renounces-us-citizenship?GT1=43001]The Article Can Be Read Here[/url][/b][/font][/size] [b][font=arial]The thing is, Superman started out as an all american superhero, yet now that more modern artists with a much more liberal mindset than the former older writers are trying to give the world a chance to embrace superman too (also i think they're trying to gain more revenue). DC is a total sellout and marvel is 10x better (IRONMAN 4EVR :3) that is my opinion.[/font][/b] [font=impact][size=7]Discuss[/size][/font]

item.title: Superman Rejects his Citizenship
item.dc:creator: @rant rant
item.description:
@rant wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Why the hell would msn consider this new’s worthy?

i now right?

Read full topic

item.title: Superman Rejects his Citizenship
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:9, topic:393018”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=490189.msg3584602#msg3584602 date=1304059972]
My reaction: Drown his ass in Kryptonite.

Batman <3

Also:

And from Wired blogger Scott Thill: “Superman has always been bigger than the United States. In an age rife with immigration paranoia, it’s refreshing to see an alien refugee tell the United States that it’s as important to him as any other country on Earth – which, in turn, is as important to Superman as any other planet in the multiverse.”

Amen brother! Amen! America needs to learn that we aren’t the “shit” anymore.

These days, if you say you’re proud to be American, you turn into a right-wing extremist, who’s selfish and doesn’t care about the rest of the world.

Back in my day, being proud of your country used to be called Patriotism.
[/quote]I don’t know where you live Zyle, but I live in the USA. As messed up as this country has gotten I would say the same thing as Superman.[/quote]

I live in the USA as well.

Read full topic

These days, if you say you’re proud to be American, you turn into a right-wing extremist, who’s selfish and doesn’t care about the rest of the world.
